title: Lemon Lightning - Novel Updates
genre: Romance   School Life   Shounen Ai   Slice of Life   Sports
tags: Adapted to Manhua   Caring Protagonist   College/University   First Love   Glasses-wearing Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Modern Day   Poor Protagonist   Popular Love Interests   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Slow Romance
author: Dr. Solo
description:
An Ning is a poor law student at A University. He’s nice, hardworking and has a huge sense of justice. His time is spent on studying and working to provide for himself.

Qin Weihang is a handsome law student who is blunt and closed-off. He rarely attends classes and doesn’t put effort in his studies. Most of his time is spent outside of school doing the one thing he loves—rock climbing.

Two people with different personalities became roommates at the start of the school year. 

This is a slow journey of a blossoming relationship between the top student and the school’s grass of the Faculty of Law.>
